coreAtributes.name: cat mask
coreAtributes.description: A cat mask, popular with vigilantes and feline worshippers.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s mask and roughly pulls it off [npc.her].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your mask and roughly pulls it off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s mask and roughly pulls it off [npc2.her].

replacementText.playerNPC: You slip the mask onto [npc.her] face.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly push the mask onto [npc.her] face.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slips the mask onto your face.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly pushes the mask onto your face.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly pushes the mask onto [npc2.her] face.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s mask and roughly pull it up.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your mask and roughly pulls it up.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s mask and roughly pulls it up.

replacementText.playerNPC: You pull the mask down over [npc.her] face.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly pull the mask down over [npc.her] face.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slips the mask down over your face.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly pulls the mask down over your face.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] slips the mask down over [npc2.name]'s face.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly pulls the mask down over [npc2.her] face.
